observation: I can see the Specter.AI homepage with a Sign Up button in the header and two main action buttons below - 'Create Account' and 'Get Started'. There are also form fields visible further down the page including email and password inputs. I need to click the 'Create Account' button to proceed with the sign-up flow.
reasoning: As a normal user wanting to sign up, I should click the 'Create Account' button which appears to be the primary call-to-action for registration on this page.

outcome.visual_observation: The sign-up button changed from a filled blue button with dashed border to an outlined button, and a red circular loading indicator appeared in the center of the screen, but no sign-up flow progression is visible
outcome.diagnosis: The tap action triggered a loading state but the sign-up flow did not progress as expected - user remains on the same page without advancing to the next step
